text: satyanisedhikalkk udaharanamayi nuhinre bharyayeyum, lutvinre bharyayeyum allahu ita etuttukaniccirikkunnu. avar rantuperum nam'mute dasanmaril petta sadâ€Œvrttaraya rant dasanmarute kililayirunnu. ennitt avare rantupereyum ivar vanciccu kalannu. appeal allahuvinre siksayil ninn yateannum avar rantuperum ivarkk olivakkikeatuttilla. ninnal rantuperum narakattil katakkunnavareateappam katannukealluka enn parayappetukayum ceytu
